miniatures.title: The Chinese Censorship Song
miniatures.description: My most popular song by far. A music parody to denounce Western compliance to Chinese censorship

miniatures.title: Emu War: The Movie
miniatures.description: My most amibitious short film. Based on the true story of the 1932 Emu War. Official selection of 2 film festivals

miniatures.title: Florida Man: The Movie
miniatures.description: A short film explaining the truth behind the myth of internet legend Florida Man

miniatures.title: Indian Tutorial Guy: The Movie
miniatures.description: Every engineer owes their diploma to an Indian who makes Youtube tutorials. This is his story, and my way of saying thanks

miniatures.title: Anarcho-Capitalism: The Movie
miniatures.description: One of my first ambitious short films. A mental exercise to imagine what an Anarcho-Capitalist society would look like

miniatures.title: Liberty Prime Liberates Hong Kong
miniatures.description: Video made at the height of Hong Kong protests, to support the freedom movement

miniatures.title: Ben Shapiro: The Movie
miniatures.description: A parody of US political pundit Ben Shapiro, known for 'destroying liberals'

miniatures.title: This Is For Your Own Good
miniatures.description: A modern re-imagining of Egor Letov's classic anti-dictatorship song, Всё идёт по плану (all goes as planned)

list_logos.title: ASSIST'ARM
list_logos.description: Design, construction, and development of a robotic arm with semi-autonomous guiding for wheelchair users

list_logos.title: ECE3SAT
list_logos.description: Implementing a 3D simulation to test the stabilization algorithm of a cubesat nano-satellite

list_logos.title: SAP
list_logos.description: Creating an algorithm to fix errors on financial statements caused by rounded numbers

list_logos.title: DIRECTION GENERALE DE L'ARMEMENT
list_logos.description: Developping an interface to automate, synchronise, secure and simplify database operations

list_logos.title: NAVAL GROUP
list_logos.description: Training an AI for maritime surveillance with procedurally generated photorealistic CGI

list_logos.title: DASSAULT AVIATION
list_logos.description: Upgrading the navigation and armament system of the Rafale jetfighter

list_logos.title: WALLETVOTE
list_logos.description: Creating a web3 (blockchain) application to help users inform themselves on the ethical considerations of their purchases, vote with their wallet

right.description: 3D Simulation to test the stabilisation algorithm of a cubesat nanosatellite

bottom.description: Presentation of the Assist'Arm project to Défi H 2018 competition
Construction to simulate magnetic fields around the nanosatellite
